body: With Takurou as the artist, it's probably always going to be fat ugly guys. I've learned to not get my hopes up with that artist.
Thought they would have Leonora in this next one. Hope they do eventually.

Just another inspirational doujin for the super fat ugly guys in real life. Perhaps, in the end, it's doujin like these that inspire the hearts of super ugly men to believe whole heartedly that they can easily find a rich, beautiful heiress and rape her like taking a walk in the park.
Just another rape doujin for erina; the plus side here is the dude is super ugly instead of being faceless.
dammit i want to see megumi!!!
